channel.title: Projects on ByteCase friend
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on ByteCase friend

item.title: RISC-V CPU Design
item.description: A single-cycle CPU deisign written in SystemVerylog following the RV32I Base Integer Instruction Set

item.title: Evolution-Sim
item.description: A simulated world where Prey and Predator interact and learn to survive base on RL using NEAT algorithm

item.title: Visual Based Game Cheats
item.description: Vision-based auto-aim program, which can run any specified object detection model and perform sudo human like mouse and keyboard action to by pass kernal level Anti-Cheat.
